title: (1) Canopied Boat on the Mosel, Looking towards the Zilleskapelle, Treis, and St Castor’s Church, Karden; (2) St Castor’s Church, Karden, Upstream; (3) Müden, Upstream; (4) Karden from Müden; (5)-(7) River Views and Boats between Müden and Moselkern
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
